title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 8.3 - Transportation by common carrier
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 8.3 - Transportation by common carrier

State Regulations
(a) General. Travel should be by the most economical method. Coach and excursion
fares should be used whenever possible. The passenger's coupon or receipt shall
accompany the traveler's expense voucher. Customary and reasonable tips for
porters or sky caps are allowed. (b) Travel by air. (1)

Air travel should be used only in those
instances where it is clearly in the State's interest to do so. (c) Taxicab charges. Appropriate
taxicab charges will be allowed. Reasonable customary tipping will be
allowed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง
8.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
